title: ShotBreakdown — Video Analytics Platform
summary: Web tool designed to modernize how basketball coaches evaluate shooting performance — replacing spreadsheets with a fast, visual, and interactive analytics system.
highlights: Synced video playback for contextual shot review
Uses secure auth with role-based access
Built for a growing sports analytics startup

content.text: ShotBreakdown enables coaches to quickly identify strengths, inefficiencies, and tactical improvements during training sessions and player development — directly from synced video and interactive stats.
Coach Nick — BBallBreakdown, an international basketball analyst and educator with over 900K YouTube subscribers and collaborations with NBA coaches and players.

items: Full web-based analytics system replacing spreadsheet workflows
Dynamic model for real-time shot tracking and filtering
Secure Google Sign-In + role-based access control
Mobile/tablet UX optimized for live courtside analysis
Interactive charts showing efficiency trends & patterns
Delivery: Netlify CDN + Google Cloud video assets

content.text: The platform combines Vue's reactivity with cloud-based video hosting to deliver instant insights with minimal backend load. Each shot record links to a precise video segment for contextual breakdown. Secure coach access, mobile-first UX, and high-performance charting ensure on-court decision-making is data-driven and fast.
